name: World of Warcraft Lore Quiz
description:
Warning! Due to high traffic the Leaderboard and Send button will temporarily not be available. I will fix this as soon as I can. I was not expecting these many people to want to play the game, so the database was not ready. Thank you everyone for playing.

This is a project that I'm currently working on, during my free time. It's a simple World of Warcraft Lore Quiz. Recently added some questions with images and about 200 questions. In the end, you can write your name and save your rating to the leaderboard. 

Thank you for playing!
